author: Staff Reporter
Karthik Madhavan
text:
RELIGION

Rathina Vinayagar Thirukoil, R.S. Puram: Ashtami puja, 7.30 p.m.

GENERAL

District Legal Service Authority: Awareness programme on drug abuse, at Suburban Matriculation Higher Secondary School, 2.30 p.m.

Ranganathan Engineering College: Election awareness campaign rally, 10 a.m.

Coimbatore Institute of Technology: Conference, 10 a.m.

D.J. Academy for Managerial Excellence: Management fest, 10 a.m.

KPR Institute of Engineering and Technology: Workshop, 9.30 a.m.

SNMV College of Arts and Science: Quiz competition, 10 a.m.

Maharaja College of Arts and Science: Election awareness rally, 10 a.m.

Dr. G.R. Damodaran College of Science: Fund rising initiative for children with cancer, 10 a.m.

Bishop Appasamy College of Arts and Science: Youth carnival, 10 a.m.

SNR Institute of Management Sciences: Inter-collegiate meet, 10 a.m.

Kalaivani College of Technology: Election awareness campaign, 9.30 a.m.

Info Institute of Engineering: Workshop, 9 a.m.

Coimbatore Institute of Management and Technology : Awareness camp, 9.30 a.m.

Karpagam College of Engineering: Start Up conclave, 9.30 a.m.
title: COIMBATORE TODAY
